mapper.select:
/* mainMapper|selectUpperMenuList */ SELECT UM.UPPER_SEQ AS upperSeq, UM.UPPER_NM AS upperNm, UM.UPPER_URL AS upperUrl, UM.UPPER_ORDER AS upperOrder, UM.AUTH_SEQ AS authSeq
,1 AS auth
,IF( ( SELECT PA.POS_AUTH_SEQ FROM POS_AUTH PA WHERE PA.AUTH_SEQ = UM.AUTH_SEQ AND PA.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} LIMIT 1 ) IS NULL, 0, 1 ) AS auth
FROM UPPER_MENU UM
WHERE UM.SHOW_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY UM.UPPER_ORDER

/* mainMapper|selectLowerMenuList */ SELECT LM.LOWER_SEQ AS lowerSeq, LM.UPPER_SEQ AS upperSeq, LM.LOWER_NM AS lowerNm, LM.LOWER_URL AS lowerUrl, LM.LOWER_ORDER AS lowerOrder, LM.AUTH_SEQ AS authSeq
,1 AS auth
,IF( ( SELECT PA.POS_AUTH_SEQ FROM POS_AUTH PA WHERE PA.AUTH_SEQ = LM.AUTH_SEQ AND PA.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} LIMIT 1 ) IS NULL, 0, 1 ) AS auth
FROM LOWER_MENU LM
WHERE LM.SHOW_YN = 'Y'
ORDER BY LM.LOWER_ORDER
